RelatedSentence: KAMPALA ( Reuters ) - Uganda 's coffee exports in April rose by 35 percent year - on - year to 336,676 60 - kg bags , helped by rising global prices , a source at the state agency said on Monday .
During the month , there was a slight increase in the farm gate coffee prices in tandem with the positive price change on the global markets , UCDA said in a monthly report for April .
